nodes.text: Podracing Tales was an online comic published on StarWars.com on December 19, 2000, as "a special holiday treat" for fans, courtesy of the Official Star Wars Website and Dark Horse Comics. It consists of eight vignettes featuring the Boonta Eve Classic podracers from Star Wars: Episode I The Phantom Menace. The small format of this comic is due to the fact it was originally created to be included as a premium in boxes of a fruit snack product in 1999[source?].
